# NOrbit N-body integrator

## Basics ### before working git fetchgit pull origin ### after working git add . git commit -m ‘Commit Message’ git push ### overwriting local changes git fetch –all git branch backup git reset –hard origin ### Pull request git checkout -b new-branch make changes git add . git commit -m ‘Commit Message’ git push origin new-branch create pull request merge pull request ### Change Branch git checkout branch-name

## To-Do check html check if works directly from PyPi

Pull requests!

### Update PyPi

  • Delete all files in the dist folder

  • Update the version number

  • python -m build

  • python -m twine upload -p “<your_password>” dist/*

### Edit and test Example Notebook

  • maybe add solar system bodies as preset? (so you can just type eg. NOrbit.earth or NOrbit.bodies / objects)
